BackAsUnderhandChinup.name: Machine-assisted Chin-up
BackAsUnderhandChinup.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip. Kneel onto platform or step onto bar.
BackAsUnderhandChinup.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackAsUnderhandChinup.comments: See suggested mount and dismount. Some assisted machines require you to stand on platform or bar. If no assisted machine is used, assist as needed by allowing training partner to pull feet up behind legs or push self up with legs on elevation. Also see selfassisted technique without machine.
BackAsUnderhandChinup.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackAsCloseGripChinupKneeling.name: Machine-assisted Parallel Close Grip Pull-up
BackAsCloseGripChinupKneeling.preparation: Step up and grasp parallel grips. Kneel on padded platform and lower body down with arm extended.
BackAsCloseGripChinupKneeling.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackAsCloseGripChinupKneeling.comments: See suggested mount and dismount. Some assisted machines require standing on bar. If no assisted machine is used, assist as needed by allowing training partner to pull feet up behind legs or push self up with legs on elevation.
BackAsCloseGripChinupKneeling.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackAsCloseGripChinup.name: Machine-assisted Parallel Close Grip Pull-up (standing)
BackAsCloseGripChinup.preparation: Step up and grasp parallel grips. Step down onto assistance lever or platform.
BackAsCloseGripChinup.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackAsCloseGripChinup.comments: See suggested mount and dismount. Some assisted machines require you to kneel on platform instead of standing on bar. If no assisted machine is used, assist as needed by allowing training partner to pull feet up behind legs or push self up with legs on elevation.
BackAsCloseGripChinup.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackAsPullupKneeling.name: Machine-assisted Pull-up
BackAsPullupKneeling.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Kneel on padded platform and lower body down with arm extended.
BackAsPullupKneeling.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackAsPullupKneeling.comments: See suggested mount and dismount. Some assisted machines require you to stand on bar. If no assisted machine is used, assist as needed by allowing training partner to pull feet up behind legs or push self up with legs on elevation. Range of motion will decrease if grip is too wide.
BackAsPullupKneeling.synergists: infraspinatus, rhomboids, levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, bicepsbrachii, deltoidposterior, brachialis, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, teresminor

BackAsPullupOpenKneeling.name: Machine-assisted Pull-up (open-centered bar)
BackAsPullupOpenKneeling.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Kneel on padded platform and lower body down with arm extended.
BackAsPullupOpenKneeling.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackAsPullupOpenKneeling.comments: See suggested mount and dismount. Some assisted machines require you to stand on bar. If no assisted machine is used, assist as needed by allowing training partner to pull feet up behind legs or push self up with legs on elevation. Range of motion will decrease if grip is too wide.
BackAsPullupOpenKneeling.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackAsPullupOpen.name: Machine-assisted Pull-up (open-centered bar, standing)
BackAsPullupOpen.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Step down onto assistance lever or platform.
BackAsPullupOpen.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackAsPullupOpen.comments: Some assisted machines require you to kneel on platform instead of standing on bar. If no assisted machine is used, assist as needed by allowing training partner to pull feet up behind legs or push self up with legs on elevation. Range of motion will decrease if grip is too wide.
BackAsPullupOpen.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids
